page.title: 04THE WEDNESDAY CLUB
page.content: ON WEDNESDAY AFTER SCHOOL BETWEEN 6.15 PM AND 7.30 PM I GO TO A CLUB CALLED THE WEDNESDAY CLUB. WE MEET IN BEDFONT BAPIST CHURCH WHICH IS IN HATTON ROAD, IT COSTS FIFTEEN PENCE TO GET IN. THE LADIES THAT TAKE US ARE CHRIS, SUE, SALLY AND JACKIE. WE PLAY GAMES LIKE ROUNDERS WHERE YOU HAVE TO HIT THE BALL AND RUN TO THE BASES IF A PERSON ON THE OTHER SIDE GETS THE BALL AND STUMPS THE BASE WITH IT YOU ARE OUT. WE ALSO PLAY TREASURE HUNT WHERE THERE ARE TWO TEAMS AND SOMEONE IS SITTING ON A CHAIR IF THEY CALL SOMETHING LIKE A COIN YOU HAVE TO BRING IT TO THEM AS FAST AS YOU CAN. THE FIRST TEAM TO DO THAT GETS ONE POINT. WE HAVE LESSONS ABOUT ALL SORTS OF THINGS LIKE WHERE FOOD COMES FROM ETC I ENJOY MY CLUB
